item.title: Glutathione Reduced - 10g Pure Powder
item.description: Glutathione is a tripeptide made up of Glutamate, Cysteine and Glycine (all very important amino acids). It can be found in both oxidized and reduced forms. The reduced form has antioxidant properties that keep cells safe from being harmed by free radical molecules. Glutathione in a reduced state can be found naturally within cells.

item.title: DL-Methionine - 100g Pure Powder
item.description: DL-Methionine is the combined product of L-Methionine and D-Methionine. This is considered an essential amino acid and is necessary in the synthesis of S-Adenosylmethionine. It can be found in large amounts in fish, beans, eggs, Brazil nuts, lentils, garlic, yogurt, onions, various meats and other plants and seeds.

item.description: Branch Chain Amino Acids, most commonly shortened to BCAA, are made up of the amino acids L-Valine, L-Leucine and L-Isoleucine, respectively. item.title: L-Glutamine alpha-Ketoglutarate (AKG) - 100g Pure Powder
item.description: This supplement is a combination between glutamine and alpha-ketoglutarate, a chemical derived from glutaric acid. It is used as a way of supplementing glutamine that, when facilitated by alpha-ketoglutarate, is able to bypass the entire digestive system and be absorbed immediately and in great quantities by moving it directly into the blood stream upon consumption rather than filtering through all of the acids and foods in the stomach.

item.title: Ascorbyl Palmitate (Vitamin C Ester) - 100g Pure Powder
item.description: Ascorbyl Palmitate is the by-product of Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) combined with Palmitic Acid. Alone, Vitamin C is not fat soluble. However, with Ascorbyl Palmitate, the concentration of Vitamin C taken in by the body can be stored for later consumption. Like Vitamin C on its own, Ascorbyl Palmitate is known to work well when combined with Vitamin E by allowing regeneration of this antioxidant to occur more rapidly.
item.g:product_type: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Vitamins

item.title: Calcium Ascorbate (Vitamin C) - 100g Pure Powder
item.description: Calcium Ascorbate is Vitamin C (otherwise known as Ascorbic Acid) in a buffered condition. Vitamin C has a natural acidity, which can be a little too much to handle for those that have gastrointestinal issues. The Ascorbic Acid is reacted with Calcium in order to significantly reduce the acidity of the solution.

item.title: Pine Bark Extract - 100g Pure Powder
item.description: Pine Bark Extract contains Proanthocyanidin, which is a bioflavonoid and another type of antioxidant. This particular extract is derived from the Pinis Massoniana tree. There are many antioxidants out there that perform the same actions as Pine Bark Extract with varying degrees of success. Some of this extract’s peers include Vitamins A, C, and E as well as Selenium. However, the Oligomeric Proanthocyanodins (OPCs) present in Pine Bark Extract are some of the most potent forms of antioxidants that can be found in nature.

item.title: Vitamin E Powder 700IU - 100g Pure Powder
item.description: Vitamin E is a fat-soluble antioxidant known for being extremely effective at protecting healthy cells from sustaining damage from free radicals. Contrary to popular belief, Vitamin E is not a single agent, but a name given to a variety of different compounds belonging to the family of Tocopherols and Tocotrienols. Each of these compounds has its own job and its own level of importance in the body. In fact, the Vitamin E comes in eight different forms that have their own importance in the body's biological processes.

item.g:product_type: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Mental Wellness

item.title: Zinc Sulfate Monohydrate - 5kg Pure Powder
item.description: Zinc Sulfate Monohydrate is a combination of Zinc (an essential mineral) and a Sulfuric Acid salt and is used in order to keep up high levels of Zinc in the body. Zinc is useful for a variety of reasons. It is able to keep the immune system healthy, along with the digestive and reproductive systems. It also carries out many other important tasks such as cell reproduction, balancing of hormones, and absorbing vitamins and minerals correctly, not to mention the synthesis of proteins, making this a very important mineral.

item.title: Copper Gluconate Anhydrous 1% - 5kg Pure Powder
item.description: Copper Gluconate is a derivative of both Copper Carbonate and Gluconic acid, with a Mannitol carrier added to bring the level of elemental Copper down to 1% so that it is fit for public consumption. It exists to make sure there is always and abundant amount of Copper in the body, which is necessary to preserve correct system functions. Copper is not only essential for humans but for all living organisms, including plants, due to its presence in many different enzymes which all assist in many vital processes in the human body.
item.g:product_type: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals

item.title: Copper L-Aspartate 1% - 5kg Pure Powder
item.description: Copper L-Aspartate 1% is the synthesized product of L-Aspartic Acid and Cupric Carbonate with a generous portion of Mannitol added to the mixture to keep the level of Copper at 1%. Copper and L-Aspartic Acid are both naturally occurring in the body, making them very bioavailable, while Mannitol is present merely as a carrier. In fact, Copper is actually among the most abundant minerals found in the human body. Its presence is no accident either as it is absolutely essential for all bodily functions to operate correctly in all living organisms including plants. In this compound, the Aspartic Acid component is included in order to facilitate the even transportation of minerals throughout the body, which is also done through a protein called Ceruloplasmin.
item.g:product_type: BulkSupplements > Products by Category > Calcium & Minerals
item.g:google_product_category: Health & Beauty > Health Care > Fitness & Nutrition > Vitamins & Supplements

item.description: Nattokinase is derived from the popular Japanese culinary sensation known as Natto. item.title: Bearberry Leaf Extract 4:1 (Uva Ursi) - 100g Pure Powder
item.description: Bearberry Leaf is a type of shrub that grows perennially and can be found in Europe, Asia and parts of North America. It is a plant that helps in erosion control of soil and therefore can be found growing in many different types of gardens all around the world. Bearberry Leaf naturally contains glycosides, such as arbutin, ericolin and methylarbutin. It also contains many flavonoids such as ellagic acid, malic acid, tannins and ursolic acid.

item.title: Chastetree Berry Extract 5:1 - 100g Pure Powder
item.description: Chastetree Berry is the fruit of a flowering shrub which is used to treat premenstrual syndrome, symptoms of menopause, low production of milk and breast pain (mastalgia). During the middle ages, the Chastetree Berry was considered to be an anaphrodisiac, a substance that suppresses libido and sex drive. It was named "Chasteberry" to signify that eating the berry promotes chastity and sexual abstinence.

item.title: Vitamin D3 (cholecalciferol) - 100g Pure Powder
item.description: Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol) is an important nutrient responsible for regulating calcium levels, which contributes to the health of teeth, bones and cartilage. It is often preferred over Vitamin D2 because of its easy absorption and stronger effects. Vitamin D levels are moderated by the sunlight, as there is a chemical contained in the skin that absorbs the Vitamin D. As a fat-soluble vitamin, it can also be found in food with high fat content, particularly oily fish and other animal products. Its solubility in oil allows it to be stored in the body to some extent as well.
item.g:product_type: BulkSupplements > Products by Goal > Heart Health

item.title: Whey Protein Isolate 90% - 1kg Pure Powder
item.description: Whey is a substance produced during cheese production. It is the liquid content that remains after the milk has curdled and coagulated. It contains lactalbumin and 5% lactose that has been diluted in water. Whey can be processed and isolated into three different types of protein: Whey Protein Isolate, Whey Protein Concentrate and Whey Protein Hydrolysate. Whey Protein Isolate is the purest form, where the water, fats and lactose content have been removed. It contains a larger amount of pure protein than Whey Protein Concentrate and Whey Protein Hydrolysate.
item.g:product_type: BulkSupplements > Featured
item.g:google_product_category: Health & Beauty > Health Care > Fitness & Nutrition > Vitamins & Supplements

item.title: Mannitol - 500g Pure Powder
item.description: Mannitol is a white, crystalline sugar alcohol that is used as sugar substitute. Mannitol is a polyol (sugar alcohol) widely used in the food and pharmaceutical industries due to its unique functional properties. It is about half as sweet as table sugar (sucrose) and has a desirable cooling effect often used to mask bitter taste, making it a popular low-calorie sweetener for cooking.

item.title: Citric Acid - 1kg Pure Powder
item.description: Citric Acid is a naturally occurring acid found primarily in several varieties of fruits and vegetables, with citrus fruits such as lemons and limes containing the highest amounts. This organic acid is frequently used as a food additive, preservative, cosmetic ingredient and powerful cleaning agent. Citric acid can be purchased as a white crystalline powder.

item.title: Phenibut - 100g Pure Powder
item.description: Phenibut is a kind of drug that possesses anxiolytic and nootropic properties. Its anxiolytic characteristics give this substance the ability to prevent anxiety and panic making a person relaxed and calm in stressful situations. Phenibut is called a nootropic substance because of its ability to enhance intelligence, improve memory, concentration and focus by increasing the supply of oxygen to the brain, by promoting the growth of new nerve tissues, and by regulating the availability of hormones, enzymes and neurotransmitters.
